name: No Breaks!
description:
To start the new year off, I challenged myself to conceptualize, design and develop a game in just 4 days.  At the end of that time period, I met every goal that I set out.  The game is of the endless runner style (Endless Driver?).  There are varying levels of difficulty (which add more items to avoid, or affect your visibility).  Also included are achievements, some of which unlock different vehicles or skins.  There is no in-game monetization; it's all just for fun.

I hope you enjoy playing the game as much as I've enjoyed creating it.  Feel free to leave a comment here, or on my develteam.com page  (https://www.develteam.com/Developer/Rowell/Portfolio).
